interface.name: AS_CO_DSP_verticalSwapIcons
interface.description:
Given a list of items, the index of the object that is to be swapped by these buttons, and the field to swap (can be left blank to just swap indexes in the array), presents a button pointing up and a button pointing down that will swap the value of that field/index with the items adjacent to the object, if possible.
In more complex cases, such as when iterating over a sorted local variable, you may need to specify specific alternate up and down saves to execute instead.
Note: if added to a gridLayout and set to icon width, these will render vertically.
